item.title: Path to Adaptive CSS
item.description: This article discusses common techniques for implementing webpages that are comfortably rendered on both PC and mobile devices. Prevent columns from getting too narrow A common need is to keep your text in the horizontal center and occupies roughly 40% to 60% of the viewport.
